detail_desc: Pull-on trousers in twill with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets, fake back pockets with decorative buttons, and tapered legs.
Pull-on trousers in twill with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets, fake back pockets with decorative buttons, and tapered legs.
Pull-on trousers in twill with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets, fake back pockets with decorative buttons, and tapered legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, wrapover front and a seam with ties at the waist. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Jersey lining.
Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, wrapover front and a seam with ties at the waist. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Jersey lining.

Set with a fine-knit top and pair of chinos in cotton. Top with a round neckline and sewn-in collar with a button. Chinos with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button and fake pockets.
Trousers in stretch, supersoft cotton twill. Adjustable, elasticated waist with a press-stud, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Glasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and clear lenses.

Leather jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and small notch lapels with a decorative metal button. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped front pockets and a decorative coin pocket with a flap and button. Quilted lining in taffeta made from recycled polyester.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Set with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Patterned vest top with a print motif and narrow ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Slub jersey shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened straight or crossed at the back. Adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Set with earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads and glass rhinestones. Six ear cuffs and one pair of hoop earrings.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and belt with a metal buckle. Unlined.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and belt with a metal buckle. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with block heels, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 1.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Top in a soft, fine knit. Deep, lace-trimmed neckline at the back with a wrapover, dropped shoulders and long, close-fitting sleeves.
Top in a soft, fine knit. Deep, lace-trimmed neckline at the back with a wrapover, dropped shoulders and long, close-fitting sleeves.
Straight-cut, knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and front pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut, knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and front pockets. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and a small fabric appliqué at the hem.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a double-layered, gathered stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders and long, voluminous sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Short, oversized jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Wide, covered elastication at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a cut-out section at the top, a high cut at the back, high-cut legs and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a cut-out section at the top, a high cut at the back, high-cut legs and press-studs at the crotch.

Short, fitted dress in jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a skirt with gathered, vertical seams for a draped effect and a flounce at the hem. Lined bodice.

Short, fitted dress in jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a skirt with gathered, vertical seams for a draped effect and a flounce at the hem. Lined bodice.

Blouse woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a sheen. Square neckline, concealed buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with a flounce. Pleated bodice and sleeves for added volume, a tie belt at the waist and flared peplum.

Blouse woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a sheen. Square neckline, concealed buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with a flounce. Pleated bodice and sleeves for added volume, a tie belt at the waist and flared peplum.
Wrapover blouse in an airy jacquard weave with short, raglan puff sleeves, ties at one side and a flared peplum. Lined.
Wrapover blouse in an airy jacquard weave with short, raglan puff sleeves, ties at one side and a flared peplum. Lined.
Wrapover blouse in an airy jacquard weave with short, raglan puff sleeves, ties at one side and a flared peplum. Lined.
Straight-cut top in a soft weave with lace at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut top in a soft weave with lace at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch fabric with narrow shoulder straps.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch fabric with narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the front and long, wide sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the front and long, wide sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the front and long, wide sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with wide elastic gores in the sides and loops on the shaft. Linings and insoles in faux shearling made from recycled polyester. Height of soles 4 cm.
Fitted turtleneck top in soft lace made from a cotton blend with long sleeves.
Fitted turtleneck top in soft lace made from a cotton blend with long sleeves.

Shirt jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with a press-stud, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and long sleeves with a tab at the cuffs. Handwarmer pockets, large patch front pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.

Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.
Strappy top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, flounce at the top and a seam with a peplum at the hem.

Oversized shirt in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Slightly longer, lightly padded bomber jacket in satin made from recycled polyester with a ribbed, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Diagonal welt pockets with a press-stud at the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.

Long hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is partly recycled.

Long hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is partly recycled.

Long hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved dress in glossy jersey with a print motif on the front. Seam at the waist and a lined tulle skirt with multiple asymmetric tiers and a glittery top layer.
Track pants in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets with a taped trim and cuffed hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and wrapover back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and wrapover back.
Kangol x H&M. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. High, elasticated waist, side pockets, and elastication at the hems.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with an inset band and a tie detail at the front. Unlined.
Joggers in imitation leather. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal front pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.

Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a viscose blend. Long-sleeved top with a V-neck, buttons down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with a high waist with covered elastication, and wide, straight legs.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Low dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Asymmetric seams on the skirt for added width. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a sheen. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves, wide smocking over the bust for a gathered effect and a softly draping skirt. Partly lined.

Short dress in a crinkled weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and on the skirt. Jersey lining.

Short dress in a crinkled weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and on the skirt. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in a textured weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Square neckline front and back, short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side and gathered seams at the waist and hem. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gathered skirt with a small flounce at the hem. Lined.
